Class MaximumTransferUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.MaximumTransferUnit

  • public class MaximumTransferUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one of the maximum transfer units used during login
    Author:
    MarfGamer

      Returns the size of the maximum transfer unit

      Returns how many times retry() can be called before yielding 0 or lower
